name: KMCSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Enable the KMC Smart skill to control all of your KMC smart devices with Alexa. For example, name your KMC smart plug “kitchen lamp” and try saying, “Alexa, turn on kitchen lamp.”
To get started controlling your KMC smart devices with Alexa:
1. Download the KMC Smart app from the app store.
2. Open the KMC Smart app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered). 3. Tap the Enable button above to link your Alexa and KMC Smart accounts.
4. Alexa will now discover any existing devices in your KMC Smart app and will automatically discover any new devices that you set up with the KMC Smart app in the future.
In order to keep your device names synced across KMC Smart and Alexa, always change the device name in your KMC Smart app.
*** UPDATE ***
This skill now allows you to independently control individual outlets on multi-outlet smart devices like our KMC Smart Tap or KMC Smart Strip. Give each outlet a unique name in the KMC Smart app and give this new functionality a try!
If you need assistance please submit a support ticket at www.kmc.support or call 208-495-5311 during our business hours 9AM to 5PM Mountain time.
